title: How do I actually win a game Riot???
body: 7 mins Dont get me wrong, I love league. But the main problem I am always facing / facing right now is feeders and completely trash players. I just cant seem to win what ever I do. No matter how hard i try or how well i (attempt) to communicate or stay positive they still feed. I know many players arnt good and i fully understand this, but my team legit doesn't even have a brain. They feed everygame no matter what. The image above is a classic game with my team, the picture was taken at 7 or 9 minutes into the game and shows exactly why i can never win a game. It would be great if Riot could perhaps move these feeders who clearly cant play and put them with others who just want to feed, this would save many players sanity and losses.

replies.body:
did you take a fucking picture with your phone lmao?

also git gud
already done that

Dafaq who builds berserker's greeves first with homeguard before getting any damage items as an adc??? is this some sort of bronze elo?{{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3031}}
Upgraded boots first item is op bronze meta m9. Git gud in bronze scroob
I'm already good, to bad my team cant be as good. Also getting boots first isnt bad

Are you Platinum down?
If you answer is yes. then your not good.

I know this insults me as I'm silver, but I'm only good at top and support so I still need to improve and with team voice communication.
I feel as if I am already good for my role :). The problem is everyone else's roles

Let's take a look and see if this is true or not.

-44% winrate.
-3.5 / 9.6 / 8.3 KDA with the only champ you've played.
-Your CS is incredibly bad
-Bronze 4

Based on this information you are not good at your role, you are not good at this game, you are among one of the worst players in this region, the problem is clearly you and you alone.
It's also called being put with feeder teammates :). One of the worst... Not even close
Meanwhile you have 3.5 / 9.6 / 8.3 KDA, I have already proved that you are the feeder and you cannot deny this, it is you who is feeding, your fault and yours alone.

Reason your still bronze picking out everything your allies do wrong and not what you do wrong.
Here's what I want you to do. play 3 normal games and pick out everything you ever do wrong and write it down. Such as:
Not warding - not buying wards - not pinging(back down, on my way, MIA etc.) - not helping in team fights - not getting kills when you should be taking objectives etc.
then keep playing normal's until you fix all of your mistakes/problems then say your good when your really carrying

My Olaf last 3 games: 10/3/15 - 14/3/7 - 7/1/5. Okay I lost the first 2 games, but there good scores because I don't stay in one lane for 50 minutes going 50/1 until another lane has failed and we lose the game (okay yes my help didn't win us the game but at lest I tried to help and didn't go salty when we lost).

I only play normals so that's not really a problem for me. As for not picking on my allies I never do, as that always leads to more toxicity and afks. I also help out lanes when I can but 99% of the time you can't really help out lane (Zed or firora) who is 10 0
